admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

0.cdata!:
EVALUATION D'UN PROJET DE REMISE EN
            ETAT DE RESEAUX D'IRRIGATION - TUNISIE

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would include rehabilitation
            of irrigation infrastructure, on-farm development, and
            consultant services for technical assistance and studies,
            aimed at integrated development in the Lower Medjerda Valley
            and Nebhana.
